## CallInvite.reject() method

Reject a call invite. Sets the state of this call invite to [CallInvite.State.Rejected](./twilio-voice-react-native.callinvite_namespace.state_enum.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
reject(): Promise<void>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;

- Resolves when the [CallInvite](./twilio-voice-react-native.callinvite_class.md) has been rejected.
